page.title: 18Sutton in 100 Years.
page.content: I think that Sutton will be run by a massive computer in one hundred years' time and the country will be computerised. I think that instead of teachers there will be a computer teacher and you can only hear his voice.I think we will have computerised doctors.There is also the possibility that people could be living on the moon.People from other planets could land{-Dawn Hutchinson. In 100 years I think Sutton will be smaller.The coastline will have changed.The shops will be run by robots.We will wear different clothes.I think we might have space stations in Sutton.We will probably have bigger and better rockets and schools may be run by computers.The cars will be different and may run on orange juice or something other than petrol{-Emma Briggs.
